material: cast iron with neoprene (or similar anti-slip) coating
usage: Used for strength training, resistance exercises, and fitness workouts in home gyms, classes, or personal workout spaces.
key_features: Dumbbell hand weights for exercise and resistance training, suitable for home gym or workout area
Cast iron construction with neoprene anti-slip coating for durability and grip
Printed weight number on each end cap for easy identification
Color coded pink finish for quick weight recognition
Hexagonal ends to prevent dumbbells from rolling away
Brand name and weight clearly marked on end caps
ai_description: A pair of compact pink hex dumbbells with a smooth, matte anti-slip coating. Each end cap is flat and clearly printed in white with the KAKSS logo and “1 KG” for quick ID. The coated cast-iron design looks solid yet comfortable to hold, and the hex shape keeps them from rolling on the floor.
target_audience: Home fitness users, beginners, and general exercisers looking for light, easy-grip dumbbells for workouts.
product_name: Kakss Neoprene Dumbbells 1+1=2 KG Pack of 1 KG Each, Anti-Slip Coated Hand Weights for Home Gym & Fitness Training - Pink
